| HistoryText             = A witch coven descended from witches who fled their own world when pursued by a magical parasite and came to reside in [[Salem (Massachusetts)|Salem]], [[Massachusetts (State)|Massachusetts]]. The Spellbinders came together after [[Kimberly Vesco (Earth-616)|Kim Vesco]] was summoned to Salem and targeted by another magical parasite [[Chad Barrow (Earth-616)|Chad Barrow]]{{r|Spellbinders Vol 1 1|6}}

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = 
* Each of the members of the Spellbinders is a witch born with a spell inside of themselves, at age five they are exposed to the pillar of smoke, a mystical device which awakens their magic. Different spells run in families with some granting a single magical ability such as teleportation while others are more open ended in the gifts they bestow such as 'far-seeing' granting clairvoyance, precognition and telepathy.
